product_name: Nite Ize HipClip Phone Pocket Clip
long_description: Affix the light, durable Nite Ize HipClip to the back of your phone, MP3 player or almost any other small item with a smooth, flat surface for instant and secure attachment to a pocket, belt or strap. Keep your mobile device securely at your side without the added weight and bulk of a holster. Tough, stainless-steel design and super-sticky 3M(R) adhesive help keep the Nite Ize HipClip firmly in place.
short_description: Affix the light, durable Nite Ize HipClip to the back of your phone, MP3 player or almost any other small item with a smooth, flat surface for instant and secure attachment to a pocket, belt or strap.
